welcome: Welcome to my trade list! These are all the pokemon I own, do you like any?
welcome2: Click on any pokemon for more information!
shortlistIntro: In here you can keep track of pokemon you like and want to trade for!
shortlistIntro2: Just go to the other list, click any, and press 'add to short list!'
shortlistIntro3: This list is saved on your device!
instructions: If you see something you like, click it so it becomes full screen and add it to this list! It will save locally.
